text: Ndipo musatukwane iwo amene amapembedza mafano poonjezera pa Mulungu weniweni kuti mwina iwo angathe kutukwana Mulungu molakwa ndi mwa umbuli. Motero tazipanga zochita zawo kukhala zosangalatsa ndipo ndi kwa Ambuye wawo kumene onse adzabwerera ndipo Iye adzawauza iwo zonse zimene anali kuchita
